E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Dennis Springer
Dear Sir,
Dennis Springer is doing pretty good at A Waterloo Indians!
He has an ERA of 2.65, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1989
Subject: Progress of Jeff McKnight
Dear Sir,
Jeff McKnight has nothing more to prove at AA Williamsport Bills!
He has an AVG of .340 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
